CustomField.description: Show Section list as per selection.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose the preferred section display option in the survey response interface: None: No section display is shown. Horizontal Path: Sections are displayed in a horizontal path, allowing participants to see their progress through the survey. Vertical Tab: Sections are displayed as vertical tabs, providing a clear overview of the survey's structure. Note that section display options are applicable only if the section-level navigation option is selected.
CustomField.label: Section Display Options
